newsFeed.title: This week's game recommendations are HERE! Steal a Femboy, Bloxstrike and Overkill
newsFeed.description: Buttstrapper has some recommendations for you! These games have been played and tested with flags, working great to improve gameplay!

newsFeed.title: .Butt is coming TOMORROW in the LATEST UPDATE!
newsFeed.description: Base64 Encoded JSON for sharing MULTIPLE Presets at ONCE! .butt is here to stay, i hope... I do like that name :3

newsFeed.title: Buttstrapper's numbers have changed.
newsFeed.description: Our new version numbers are here, for a more consistent look and more information, we also just wanted to use PP. :)

newsFeed.title: Buttstrapper 2.1 is LIVE!
newsFeed.description: The new Buttstrapper update has been released to the Beta Branch of Buttstrapper. Do you wish to update? Click 'Check it out' to download!
